docs.name: Vocat API
docs.info: Vocat is a teaching and learning platform that facilitates qualitative and quantitative assessment of a range of media. Built as a collaboration between the Center for Teaching and Learning at Baruch College, City University of New York and Cast Iron Coding of Portland, Oregon, the tool is in active development.
docs.copyright: Copyright 2015 Baruch College, City University of New York

resources.name: Annotations
resources.full_description: Annotations are the comments that users record about a specific media object. If the media being annotated has duration (video or audio media), then the annotation will typically be tied to a specific timestamp on the media. The ID of the user who creates the annotation will be assigned to the parameter author_id property. The API does not currently allow the creation of annotations authored by other users.

methods.name: show

errors.description: The user is not authorized to view the annotation.

params.name: id
params.description: The ID of the annotation to be shown

examples:
Sample Response: { "id": 11678, "asset_id": 4542, "author_id": 4470, "body": "

Another annotation...
